resources.string:
Welcome to Last Assassin

 Last Assassin facilitates the ultimate game of hide and seek tag. Get a group of friends and family together and play a game.


At the beginning of the game everyone is assigned a target and given directions to their targets location. Your goal is to tag your target. When you tag someone, they join your team and the person they were chasing is your new target. The last player left is the winner.


When you start a game, a timer starts a countdown. This is your chance to run and hide! Once the countdown finishes, the game begins and you can start chasing your target. 

 To get your target out you can tag them, nerf gun them, water gun them, etc. Just make sure everyone is on the same page.


This is a location-based game, and we will need to access your location data. Please keep your phone on while playing the game, and dont close out of the app - or you may be kicked out of the game. Also, please discuss the physical boundaries of the game with all players before beginning the game.


We hope you enjoy Last Assassin!

Exercise caution and follow all laws while playing this game.

 Be alert and pay attention to your surroundings

 Do not tresspass. Do not enter dangerous areas. Do not play while driving. Do not look at your phone while running.

Last assassin is not responsible for any accidents, injuries, harm, or other damages caused as a direct or indirect result of this game.
